Hi, we're geo:truth.

A non-profit research organization focused on uncovering health disparities and global challenges using geography.

We are on a mission to use geography and data to uncover health disparities and drive positive change globally.

We envision a world where everyone has equal access to health and well-being regardless of zipcode.

We value equity, innovation, collaboration, transparency, empowerment.

We believe that the truth is worth discovering.







What We Do

Geospatial Analysis + Epidemiological Research

Utilizing mapping and spatial analysis techniques to identify health disparities and high-risk areas, informing targeted interventions.

Conducting rigorous epidemiological studies to uncover the root causes of health inequities and develop evidence-based strategies for prevention and intervention.

Capacity Building

Providing training and technical assistance to give power back to local organizations and healthcare providers with the tools and knowledge to address health disparities in their communities.

Advocacy and Policy

Advocating for policies and initiatives that promote health equity and ensure that vulnerable populations have access to the resources and support they need to thrive.







Get Involved

Join the geo:truth community (or 'tribe' as we say) in our mission to build a healthier, more equitable world!

Whether you're a researcher, practitioner, advocate, or concerned citizen, there are many ways to get involved with geo:truth. Together, we can make a difference and create lasting change for generations to come.
